thread.title: A. Poe
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by A. Poe

author: A. Poe
title: A. Poe
text: I bought FOUR mats at one time, for FOUR different size frames, really - really taking a gamble because I did not want to pay the expensive shipping more than once. They all came out exactly as I had requested. The colors look good, the sizes are good, etc. The only thing I would change is that mine all came in a box without any instructions. It would be nice if there was a recommendation for what tape to use, where to place the pieces of tape. Of course I used the internet and they all turned out great.
